de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.management

Class OpenDiabetesPluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.management.OpenDiabetesPluginManager

  • public final class OpenDiabetesPluginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is intended to simplify the interaction with all the plugins used in OpenDiabetes. --Singleton--

      • getCompatiblePluginIDs

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getCompatiblePluginIDs(OpenDiabetesPlugin plugin)
        Takes a plugin and returns all pluginIDs that correspond to an available, compatible plugin.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin that is compatible with all the plugins returned
        Returns:
        a list of all plugins that are compatible with the provided one

      • getPluginsOfType

        public <T extends OpenDiabetesPlugin> java.util.List<T> getPluginsOfType(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Returns all available plugins of the desired type, for example you get a list of all Importer plugins by typing getPluginsOfType(Importer.class).
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of plugins specified by type
        Parameters:
        type - the type of plugins you want to recieve (eg Importer.class, Exporter.class, ...)
        Returns:
        a list of all available Plugins of the specified type

      • getPluginIDsOfType

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPluginIDsOfType(java.lang.Class type)
        Returns all pluginIDs of available plugins that have the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of plugins you want the ids from
        Returns:
        a list of all pluginIDs that correspond to a available plugin of the specified type
        See Also:
        this#getPluginsOfType(Class)}

        public java.lang.String pluginToString(OpenDiabetesPlugin plugin)
        Takes a plugin and returns the pluginID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the pluginID of the plugin

        Type Parameters:

      • getHelpFilePath

        public java.nio.file.Path getHelpFilePath(OpenDiabetesPlugin plugin)
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin for which you want the help file
        Returns:
        a path to a file containing .md/html formatted text, that gets displayed to the user if he wants to know more about that plugin.
